data.name: projectJUPITER_a
data.description:
A virtual reality giant maze experience to find and reach the goal in the distant future, on a Jupiter that has been changed by many things!

No tension (except for the heights)!
Recommended for those who want to play a leisurely stroll through a large world, or for those who find battles annoying.

You can challenge every aspect from the beginning. You can start from anywhere, in any order.
in any order.

Note that there is some jumping action and falling from heights, so be careful if you are not good at heights or if you get easily intoxicated.

Compatible with Quest/Quest2
Sitting play is recommended.
Currently only available in Japanese and English.

Free trial version is available.
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5562387927144863

translations.display_name: プロジェクトジュピター_a
translations.long_description:
遠未来、いろいろあって変わり果てた木星を舞台に、
ゴールを目指すVR立体迷路体験

当α版は全6面。どこからでも遊べます。時間の無い方に
今後も開発を続行し面数を増やしたりする予定

ジャンプとか高所からの落下とかあるので酔いやすい方、高所がダメな方は注意
translations.short_description:
遠未来、いろいろあって変わり果てた木星を舞台に、
ゴールを目指すVR立体迷路体験

　Bloom effect can be switched ON/OFF at option (O00:"Orthosie")
